mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deal ( deal_no, deal_name, deal_price, deal_kind, deal_img, deal_date, deal_fix_revenue, deal_fix_expenditure, mem_no, deal_option, deal_division) VALUES ( deal_seq.nextval, #{deal_name}, #{deal_price}, #{deal_kind}, #{deal_img}, #{deal_date}, #{deal_fix_revenue}, #{deal_fix_expenditure}, #{mem_no}, #{deal_option}, #{deal_division} )
